summary: Changes the armor in the default level lists for the Stormcloaks, Imperial and Thalmor factions.
descriptionHtml:
READ

NPCs wont update to new armor, unless you use Resurrect on them.(start a new game, then the npcs will use the new armor.)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Changes the armor in the default level lists for the Stormcloaks, Imperial and Thalmor factions.

Whats done?

Stormcloaks
Thalmor
Guard Helms
Install Script

What to left?

Imperial


What has been and is going to be changed?

I have already changed Stormcloak Armor to steel armor, Imperial armor will be changed to the Heavy version. Thalmor Armor has had glass armor removed from the Levelist.(only use Elven now.)

What wont be changed?

Textures
Meshes
Reward level lists

Bugs?

NPCs that don\'t use level lists wont show new armor.
NPCs wont update to new armor, unless you use Resurrect on them.(start a new game, then the npcs will use the new armor.)

FAQ:

Q: How many ESPS will there be?
A: Many, so you can pick and choose what replacers you\'ll use.

Q: Will this stuff up my texture mods?
A: No, all this changes is faction level lists in an esp file.

Q: Why change the faction armors?
A: I don\'t like the Default, I feel the Stormcloaks need better looking armor, Imperial Legion needs less light armor NPCS, and Thalmor should use Elven, not Glass armor.

Q: Is there an scripted install for NMM?
A: Yes.

Q: Is Ace992 Happy-I-am?
A: Yes, same person.
author: Happy-I-am

files.name: Faction Armor Overhaul
files.changelogHtml:
Added Thalmor ESP, Removed Glass Armor from their Levellists
Made Imperial Heavy Armor same stats as Steel to balance out Stormcloaks Armor
Added Optional ESP to change guard Helms to Steel
Added Optional ESP to have no full helms for Stormcloaks
Minor Levellist Changes for Stormcloaks
Added Install script for NMM
